name: 3D Semi Truck Parking Simulator 2017
description:
** REALISTIC SEMI TRUCK DRIVING GAME! **
** SUPER HD 3D GRAPHICS! **

Ever dream of getting behind a big 18 wheeler semi truck? In this thrilling driving and parking game, you get to not only experience what its like to drive a big semi truck, but you also get to park it! If you are a big fan of classic truck and car parking or driving games, you will be in for a big treat! Driving and parking a semi truck is a LOT different. Just give it a try and find out how hard it really is!

FEATURES

- All semi trucks unlocked.
- Awesome 3D graphics.
- 10 levels to unlock.
- Multiple camera views to help with your parking.
- Variety of steering options.
